changeSet.comment: Creating new role for editing bed tags only

changeSet.author: Santhosh, Maharjun

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM role_role WHERE parent_role = "InPatient-App-Read-Only" AND child_role = "InPatient-Edit-BedTags-Only";

changeSet.comment: Inheriting privileges from InPatient-App-Read-Only role to InPatient-Edit-BedTags-Only role
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO role_role(parent_role, child_role) VALUES ("InPatient-App-Read-Only", "InPatient-Edit-BedTags-Only");

changeSet.author: Santhosh, Maharjun

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM privilege WHERE privilege = "Edit Tags";
SELECT count(*) FROM role_privilege WHERE role = "InPatient-Edit-BedTags-Only" AND privilege = "Edit Tags";

changeSet.comment: Adding Edit Tags privilege to InPatient-Edit-BedTags-Only role
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO role_privilege(role, privilege) VALUES ("InPatient-Edit-BedTags-Only", "Edit Tags");

changeSet.author: Santhosh, Maharjun

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM privilege WHERE privilege = "Get Tags";
SELECT count(*) FROM role_privilege WHERE role = "InPatient-App-Read-Only" AND privilege = "Get Tags"

changeSet.comment: Adding Get Tags privilege to InPatient-App-Read-Only role
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO role_privilege(role, privilege) VALUES ("InPatient-App-Read-Only", "Get Tags");

changeSet.author: Santhosh, Maharjun

changeSet.comment: Adding Get Tags privilege to InPatient-Read role
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO role_privilege(role, privilege) VALUES ("InPatient-Read", "Get Tags");

changeSet.author: Santhosh, Maharjun

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM privilege WHERE privilege = "Edit Tags";
SELECT count(*) FROM role_privilege WHERE role = "InPatient-App" AND privilege = "Edit Tags"

changeSet.comment: Adding Edit Tags privilege to InPatient-App role
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO role_privilege(role, privilege) VALUES ("InPatient-App", "Edit Tags");

changeSet.author: Santhosh, Maharjun
